name: The Doom of the Pond
overview: An antihero, an ancient legend, a cult of priestesses, horrible monsters, killer clowns, strange messages, old pictures... all this and much more on Furillo Productions' first interactive text adventure for the ZX Spectrum 128k! Are you going to miss it? Bernard Valley, a dystopian June 1980... Peter Parrish is a lonesome and shady ex-director of obscure "customer service" companies. He is about to leave Arrollito and Pozolón, the turtles that his nephews gave him for his birthday that does not want to clean and feed, at the pond of the village, the place where everybody abandons their pets... Parrish will soon realize that his life will change forever.
